alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 5:22PM AKST until December 15 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM WEDNESDAY TO 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 18 inches and ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch or less. * WHERE...Copper River Basin. * WHEN...From 9 PM Wednesday to 3 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas along the Richardson Highway and the Glenn Highway near the Tok Cut Off and Chickaloon will have the highest accumulations. Mixed precipitation is expected along the Edgeton Highway and McCarthy Road early Thursday morning. Blowing snow will reduce visibility with any higher winds along the Richardson Highway, south of the Edgerton Highway.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice will make travel very hazardous. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
